sentence.Network_en: The small shopkeepers realized that the hypermarket will take away some of their trade.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些小店主们很清楚那个超级市场将会抢走他们的部分生意.

sentence.Network_en: The hypermarket stations had a wide selection of branded foods, clean toilets, friendly service and fast checkouts.
sentence.Network_cn: 这家超大型连锁加油站有各种名牌食品 、 洁净的卫生间 、 友好的服务并且结帐迅速.

sentence.Network_en: It is natural for the shopkeeper to feel annoyed when the hypermarket is set up close to his shop.
sentence.Network_cn: 当特大超级市场挨着这家商场建立起来时,店主感到苦恼是正常的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大卖场(HyPermarket)这种大型超市模式是目前在中国发展速度最快，规模最大的。它的典型代表是法国的家乐福，沃尔玛自深圳洪湖 …
作为大型超级市场（HyperMarket）概念的创始者，家乐福在1963年开设了世界上第一家大型超市。如今家乐福已发展成为欧洲最大 …
5、大型超市（hypermarket）：实际营业面积6000平方米以上，品种齐全，满足顾客一次性购齐的。根据，可以分为以经营食品为主的大型.
３、 量贩店（hypermarket）。４、 超级购物中心（shopping mall）。

list.abs: Tianjin Home World Hypermarket Company Limited is the largest hypermarket store company in North China .天津家世界连锁超市有限公司是华北地区最大的超市连锁企业。
me myself has been working at the headquarters of a hypermarket group and I possess the deep recognition for the service criterions of the retailing business .我自己也曾在超市行业的总部供职，深知零售行业的服务准则。
hypermarket是什么意思... ... Local Hypermarket ： 本土超市 bestmart hypermarket ： 马来西亚买家 bestmart hypermarket ： 地区.
business networks and hypermarket contracts in new situations ., 新经济下的企业网络与超市场契约.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1970s: translation of French hypermarché, from hyper- 'beyond, exceeding' + marché 'market'

entry.def: A hypermarket is a very large supermarket.

means.word_mean: 1. a huge supermarket (usually built on the outskirts of a town)

auth_sentence.content: The Thai tycoon was in Shanghai presiding over the opening of the CP Group's Lotus hypermarket.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Thai tycoon was in Shanghai presiding over the opening of the CP Group's Lotus hypermarket.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Thai tycoon was in Shanghai presiding over the opening of the CP Group's Lotus hypermarket.
